channel.title: Please help with npc drops
channel.description: Can any body please make a tut or link me a tut on how to make npc's drop items...cause i though i found the script/file and when i put ID's in ....they didnt drop the stuff

item.title: Please help with npc drops
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

It might be in item.java

public static int slayer135items[] = {1052,4708,4712,4714,6110,6109,6108,6107,6106,6111,4087,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,4834,6110,6109,6108,6107,6106,6111,4834,4834,4834,4675}; public static int randomSlayer135item() { return slayer135items[(int)(Math.random()*slayer135items.length)]; }

Read full topic
